extendedInfo.description: Rajasthan Tourism Beta Version under testing.This app is build for the tourist from India and abroad for the ease of reaching the exact destination or monument places of Rajasthan and to provide basic details about that specific monument with availability of basic facilities at that destination so that one can closely know the heritage and culture of Rajasthan. This is a free offline app of tour guide which includes the information about the historical monuments, pilgrimages, fairs and festivals of Rajasthan. Through this app a visitor can take basic information about the famous monuments with its location without any internet connection before reaching the touring destination so that they can plan their trip in a better manner.This app also includes the information about the RTDC Approved hotels, restaurants, staying facilities and shopping destinations so that a visitor can get the reliable services without facing any type of inconvenience.The information in this app is included from the Rajasthan Tourism website.The features of this mobile app are mentioned below:-â¢	App must be downloaded to the mobile device to use this app.â¢	This downloaded app works offline, No internet connection required.â¢	The app covers various Tourist Destinations of Rajasthan, the monuments in each destination with its basic information and map* to locate that monument or destination.â¢	For the ease to reach and stay at that destination information about the hotels, stay, restaurants and the shopping destination are also mentioned in the app.â¢	The details of wildlife sanctuaries of Rajasthan are also mentioned for the wildlife lovers.â¢	Sports field covers the details of some passionate sports being played in Rajasthan with destination where that sport is famous.â¢	As Rajasthan is a colorful state which has a rich culture, so fairs and festivals are the major source to recognize Rajasthanâs tradition and  culture directly thatâs why there is a section which describes the details of various fairs and festivals with map-based* location of its celebration site.â¢	The useful features of this app is that an individual can get complete information about the monuments, pilgrimages, fairs and festivals, sports, hotels, staying facilities, restaurants  of  Rajasthan by selecting the particular destination or can be searched by their choice.If you need more information about any destination or monument then you can log on to our website www.rajsthantourism.gov.in to get detailed information.So before starting your trip to Rajasthan, download the app into your mobile devices which works without the need of a live internet connection.We respect and welcome the suggestions to make this app more clear and expressive.Note: - Internet connection required getting the location on MAPS.* Internet connection required
